data.meta_site_name: Centennial Theatre Department - Circle Pines, MN
data.text:
Theatre Beyond

A Brand New Program for Centennial Theatre Students

Headed up by Melissa Krieger and Eric Webster:

“Theatre Beyond” is a program that will bring more opportunities for education, learning, fundamentals and experiences for

high school students in the theatre program that are considering a career in the performing arts.

Theatre Beyond Features:

Professional Guest Speakers opportunities- from performance to technical aspects to producing.

Seeing professional theater shows with venue tours and Q & A opportunities with the cast and crew

Participation in the “Spotlight Awards” program

Keeping students updated on opportunities to further their experiences and education.

Professional Guidance for the “Next steps”. Colleges, and how to pursue a career in the performing arts.

Attending or producing play readings

Audition workshops

Actors cabaret - a series of monologues and scenes

Classic Movies Club. THE ESSENTIALS OF FILM KNOWLEDGE

AND MORE!

Have an upcoming show you'd like to tell us about? Or want to invite your theatre family?

Use this form to let us know and we'll spread the word!
